availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Addison Peale Russell (Ohio, printer + secretary of state )

body.p: Franklin County, Ohio, printer and statesman. Wilmington, Ohio native. Printer in Warren County, Ohio, in 1850. Republican representative to the Ohio General Assembly in 1855. Resident of Columbus in 1860. Republican secretary of state for the state of Ohio from 1858 to 1862. Financial agent for the state of Ohio from 1860 to 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Warren County, Lebanon, p. 45A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Franklin County, Columbus Ward 2, p. 95.
History of the Republican Party in Ohio, ed. Joseph P. Smith (Chicago, IL: Lewis Publishing Company, 1898), 32.
